outline:
1. to suckle, nurse, suck
    1. (Qal)
      1. to suck
      2. suckling, babe (subst)
    2. (Hiphil)
      1. to give suck to, nurse
      2. nursing, nursing woman, nurse (participle)
kjv_def: milch, nurse(-ing mother), (give, make to) suck(-ing child, -ling).
strongs_def: to suck; causatively, to give milk
